page.title: 15W.C.A.COMMUNITY ASSOSIATION
page.content: The Wrenthorpe Community Assosiation are trying to raise money to pay the builders who are going to build a new Village Hall.They have been holding events for 7 years.Some of the events are things like discos,dances and the May Day Spectacular.They have some games to take to galas like Bat a Rat,The Key Game,Play Your Cards Right and other games like that.In Bat a Rat there is a tube which you send the rats down and there is a space at the end where you hit the rats.Play Your Cards Right is like the one on TV.The hall is used for Playgroup, Whist Drive,discos and dances.They also use it for Bingo.At the discos there are drinks,crisps and sweets on sale.
